SEARCH
Package utils

Class Player

java.lang.Object
utils.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents the main character controlled by the user. It contains the player's name, health, weapon, and inventory. It includes methods for managing the player's inventory, and the actions they perform, such as searching for items, resting, and checking their stats.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(int health, boolean isAlive)
      Constructs a new Player with health and alive status.
      Parameters:
      health - The initial health of the player
      isAlive - Whether the player is alive or not

  • Method Details

    • displayBackpackContents

      public String displayBackpackContents()
      Displays the contents of the player's backpack.
      Returns:
      A formatted string listing the items in the backpack

    • getBackpackSize

      public int getBackpackSize()
      Calculates the number of items in the player's backpack.
      Returns:
      The number of items in the backpack

    • addBackpackItem

      Adds an item to the player's backpack.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add to the backpack

    • removeBackpackItem

      public void removeBackpackItem(Items item)
      Removes an item from the player's backpack.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to remove from the backpack

    • getBackpackItem

      public Items getBackpackItem(int index)
      Gets an item from the player's backpack by index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the item to get
      Returns:
      The item at the specified index

    • getBackpackItem

      public Items getBackpackItem(String name)
      Gets an item from the player's backpack by name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item to get
      Returns:
      The item with the specified name

    • rest

      public void rest()
      Allows the player to rest and recover health. If the player has already rested in the same location, they cannot rest again.

    • checkCharacter

      public void checkCharacter()
      Displays the player's stats, and what they are carrying.

    • search

      public void search()
      Searches the player's current location for items. The player can search for items, nuclear cores, or the NPC. If the player has already searched the location, they will not find anything.

    • calculateWeight

      public void calculateWeight()
      Calculates the player's weight based on the weapon and items in the backpack.
